name: Mechanic Service Station Sim
description:
Simulator Mechanic Service Station
Build a career as a car mechanic from an ordinary employee to the owner of a network of service stations.
Start work on repair of faulty cars!
Consistently perform all necessary actions.
Meet customers, take the order, pay for it at the box office, lift the car to the stand and start repairs.
Run your own business! With the money you earn, hire employees and improve the service STATION.
Choose your company logo and uniform color.
Increase the level of professionalism of hired car mechanics and move to the next stage of development.
Buy new stations, increasing your income.

An informative map of the city will tell you what is happening at a particular station.
Be in the middle of it!
Move through the stations, getting involved in the work of an auto mechanic.
Exciting casinos will allow you to escape and get a nice bonus.
Watch the profit, periodically taking the accumulated money.
Become a successful businessman by building an Empire.

Share your opinion about the game in the comments.
Become the best, learning all the subtleties of the profession mechanic.
